prompt.content: Calculate Duke Energy's (NYSE: DUK) implied average retail electricity price per MWh for FY 2024. Round to the nearest two decimals.

rubrics.name: Defines the average retail revenue per MWh as Retail electric revenue (Electric Utilities & Infrastructure) / Total retail electric sales in MWh for 2024.

messages.content: Defines the average retail revenue per MWh as Retail electric revenue (Electric Utilities & Infrastructure) / Total retail electric sales in MWh for 2024.

rubrics.name: States FY 2024 Retail electric revenue for Electric Utilities & Infrastructure as $24,593 million.

messages.content: States FY 2024 Retail electric revenue for Electric Utilities & Infrastructure as $24,593 million.

rubrics.name: States the FY2024 total retail electric sales as 214,585 GWh from the Electric Utilities & Infrastructure segment.

messages.content: States the FY2024 total retail electric sales as 214,585 GWh from the Electric Utilities & Infrastructure segment.

rubrics.name: Converts the 214,585 GWh to 214,585,000 MWh using a factor of 1,000.

messages.content: Converts the 214,585 GWh to 214,585,000 MWh using a factor of 1,000.

rubrics.name: Calculates the unrounded implied average retail price per MWh as $114.60726.

messages.content: Calculates the unrounded implied average retail price per MWh as $114.60726.

rubrics.name: Rounds the implied average retail price to two decimals and reports $114.61 per MWh as the final answer.

messages.content: Rounds the implied average retail price to two decimals and reports $114.61 per MWh as the final answer.
